table_description: This table contains one row per DICOM Segmentation SeriesInstanceUID available from IDC, and captures key metadata about the segmentation series including the number of segments, segmentation type, algorithm type and name, and the segmented image series.

columns.name: SeriesInstanceUID
columns.description: DICOM SeriesInstanceUID identifier of the segmentation series

columns.name: SegmentationType
columns.description: Type of segmentation as defined in DICOM SegmentationType attribute

columns.name: total_segments
columns.description: Number of segments in the segmentation series obtained by counting distinct DICOM SegmentNumber values in the DICOM SegmentatationSequence

columns.name: AlgorithmType
columns.description: Segmentation algorithm type as available in DICOM SegmentAlgorithmType

columns.name: AlgorithmName
columns.description: Segmentation algorithm name as available in DICOM SegmentAlgorithmName

columns.name: segmented_SeriesInstanceUID
columns.description: SeriesInstanceUID of the referenced image series that the segmentation applies to
